Name: Nyx-Fleece Ram
Traits: Charge. If the ram moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 5 (2d4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. Magic Resistance. The ram has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects. Sure-Footed. The ram has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws against effects that would knock it prone.
Actions: Ram. Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) force damage.
